action.action-desc: Mr. Duncan of South Carolina (for himself, Mr. Amash, Mrs. Blackburn, Mr. Lamborn, Mr. Mulvaney, Mr. Cole, Mr. King of Iowa, Mr. Pompeo, Mr. Buck, Mr. Gosar, Mr. Franks of Arizona, Mr. Chabot, Mr. Salmon, Mr. Grothman, and Mr. Brat) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the provisions of title 40, United States Code, commonly known as the Davis-Bacon Act, to raise the threshold dollar amount of contracts subject to the prevailing wage requirements of such provisions.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Adjusting Davis-Bacon for Inflation Act.

section.header: Threshold of contracts subject to Davis-Bacon
section.text: Section 3142(a) of chapter 31 of title 40, United States Code is amended by striking $2,000 and inserting $50,000.
